CANVAS_UNSUPPORTED: Your browser does not support the canvas element.
CONFIRMATION_DIALOG_MATCH_A_PHOTO_EXIT: The photo content will be lost if you close. Make sure the colors you want to keep have been added to your palette. Do you still want to close?

CVW.WARNING_REPLACEMENT: Opening this scene will replace the current scene you are working on. Would you like to continue?

ERROR_BOUNDARY.MESSAGE: We encountered an error preventing us from rendering this component at this time.
ERROR_BOUNDARY.TITLE: Sherwin-Williams Color Tools Error

ERROR_LOADING_COLORS: We're unable to load colors right now.
FIND_COLORS_IN_CW: FIND COLORS IN THE DIGITAL COLOR WALL

ICON_INFO_CONTENT.ADD_COLOR: In a color swatch, tapping this icon will add that color to My Color Palette. In My Color Palette, tapping this icon will open the Digital Color Wall.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.COLOR_DETAILS: Tapping this icon will expand info about that color, including coordinating colors, similar colors and color details.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.GRAB_&_REORDER: Tap and drag this icon to reorder colors within My Color Palette.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.MORE_SCENES: This icon opens interior and exterior room scene options. Explore different scenes to find your favorite and begin painting.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.SAVE: Tap this icon to save your inspiration and ideas. Access them in My Ideas any time you’re logged in to mySW.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.TRASH_A_COLOR: Tap this icon to delete a color from My Color Palette. Dragging an inspirational color dot over this icon will delete it from your inspirational color options.

ICON_INFO_CONTENT.DEFINE_AREA: Outline an area to paint it. Be sure to enclose the area by starting and ending at the same point.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.ERASE: Quickly remove paint from your photo.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.PAINT_AREA: Use the Paint Area feature to automatically detect and paint surface areas. Just click or tap on a surface to highlight it, then click or tap again to paint.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.PAINTBRUSH: Select this icon to paint your photo freehand. Just point, click or tap, and drag to add color to any area.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.REMOVE_AREA: Use this tool to select and remove paint from a defined area.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.SELECT: Select an area, then use the tool bar to paint, edit paint color or remove paint from your photo.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.UNDO_&_REDO: Easily delete or repeat your last action.
ICON_INFO_CONTENT.ZOOM: Zoom in and pan around within your photo to paint small areas with better accuracy.

ADDING_COLORS.CLICK_ADD_A_COLOR_ICON_IN_A_COLOR_TILE_T: Clicking the add a color icon inside a color tile will add a color to the Color Palette
ADDING_COLORS.CLICK_THE_ADD_COLOR_ICON_TO: Click the add a color icon from the color palette to launch the digital color wall and explore color at any time during your experience
ADDING_COLORS.START_A_NEW_PALETTE_TO_ADD_MORE_THAN_EIG: My Color Palette can hold up to 8 colors at a time. To add more, just save your current palette and start a new one.

COLOR_DETAILS.CLICK_THE_COLOR_DETAILS_ICON_TO: Click the color details icon to see a color's details
COLOR_DETAILS.PREVIEW_A_COLOR_IN_COLOR_DETAILS: Preview a color in 5 different photos to decide if you want to add it to your palette

MY_COLOR_PALETTE.AN_ACTIVE_COLOR_STATE: An active color state shows the paint color to be applied to the scene
MY_COLOR_PALETTE.CLICK_THE_ADD_COLOR_ICON_TO: Click the add a color icon from the color palette to launch the digital color wall and explore color at any time during your experience
MY_COLOR_PALETTE.CLICK_THE_COLOR_DETAILS_ICON_TO: Click the color details icon to see a color's details
MY_COLOR_PALETTE.CLICK_THE_COLOR_DETAILS_ICON_TRASH_ICON_: Click the color details icon to see a color's details, Click the trash icon to delete a color swatch
MY_COLOR_PALETTE.CLICK_THE_TRASH_ICON_TO: Click the trash icon to delete a color swatch
MY_COLOR_PALETTE.TAP_AND_HOLD_THE_BOTTOM_EDGE_OF_A_COLOR_: Tap and hold the bottom edge of a color swatch to rearrange your palette

SAVING_MY_WORK.CLICK_SAVE_ICON_TO: Tap the save icon at the bottom of the page
SAVING_MY_WORK.NAME_YOUR_CURRENT_PHOTO: Name your current photo or palette for future use

SUB_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION.ADDING_COLORS: On your keyboard, use "up", "down", "left", and "right" arrow keys (← ↓ ↑ →) to navigate within color grids.
SUB_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION.MY_COLOR_PALETTE: On your keyboard, use "up" and "down" arrow keys (↑ ↓) to switch focus between live palette and paintable scene regions.

SUB_HEADER.ADDING_COLORS: Add colors to your palette wherever you see an plus icon.
SUB_HEADER.COLOR_DETAILS: Provides a color scene preview, coordinating colors, similar colors and additional information.
SUB_HEADER.ICONS_&_BUTTONS: Use these icons and buttons to help narrow down your final choices.
SUB_HEADER.MY_COLOR_PALETTE: My Color Palette is used to collect and compare colors to paint with.
SUB_HEADER.PAINTING_MY_OWN_PHOTO: Use these tools to help you see how color will look in your space.
SUB_HEADER.SAVING_MY_WORK: When you register an account with mySW, you can access saved color palettes from any device.

IMAGE_INVISIBLE: This image is invisible to the user.
LIVE_MESSAGE_COLOR_NAME: Color {previewColorName} is active. Press tab to go to other color pins
LIVE_MESSAGE_MOVE_PIN: Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move your picked color. Hold shift for fine movement.

LIVE_PALETTE_MODAL.DELETE_COLOR: Delete a color below before adding a new one, or create a new palette.

MY_IDEAS.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
MY_IDEAS.MY_IDEAS_CONTENT: Log in or Register for a mySW account to save all your ideas and see them on any of your devices.
MY_IDEAS.MY_IDEAS_HEADER: View and edit your saved ideas
MY_IDEAS.NO_IDEAS_DESC: Save all your inspiration and ideas here, and reference them when you're ready to start painting. Edit them any time.
MY_IDEAS.SCENE_EXPIRATION: Saved scenes will be removed 30 days after their last update.
MY_IDEAS.TITLE: View and edit your ideas

NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.COLOR_COLLECTIONS: Find colors that work together seamlessly throughout your home.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.DIGITAL_COLOR_WALL: Search {brand} paint colors to add to your palette or get color info.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.EXPERT_COLOR_PICKS: Find expertly designed color palettes to use in your space.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.INSPIRATIONAL_PHOTOS: Use our images to discover colors from around the world.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.MATCH_A_PHOTO: Capture colors from any photo and match them to real paint colors.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.PAINTED_PHOTOS: See colors in context to start building your color confidence.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.UPLOAD_YOUR_PHOTO_ANDROID: Virtually paint your own photo by downloading the ColorSnap Visualizer for Android app.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.UPLOAD_YOUR_PHOTO_IPAD: Virtually paint your own photo by downloading the ColorSnap Visualizer for iPad app.
NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_SUB_CONTENT.UPLOAD_YOUR_PHOTO_IPHONE: Virtually paint your own photo by downloading the ColorSnap Visualizer for iPhone app.

NAV_DROPDOWN_LINK_TIP_DESCRIPTION.UPLOAD_YOUR_PHOTO: Photo Tips: For best results make sure your room is well lit. Natural light works best.

NAV_DROPDOWN_TITLE.EXPLORE_COLORS: Explore all the ways to start building My Color Palette.
NAV_DROPDOWN_TITLE.GET_INSPIRED: Find inspiration for your next painting project.

PAINT_SCENE.SELECT_PALETTE_DESC: Would you like to load these saved colors into this palette? This will replace any color(s) currently there.

PAINT_TOOLS.PAINTAREA: fill a continuous area with color
PAINT_TOOLS.REMOVEAREA: Erase an area by creating a polygon

TOOLTIPS.ADDCOLORS: Click or tap here to add colors to your palette.
TOOLTIPS.DEFINEAREA: Outline an area to paint it. Be sure to enclose the area by starting and ending at the same point.
TOOLTIPS.HIDEPAINT: Use this tool to see the original room scene.
TOOLTIPS.INFO: Click here to revisit the Tool Tips.
TOOLTIPS.PAINTAREA: Use the Paint Area feature to automatically detect and paint surface areas. Just click or tap on a surface to highlight it, then click or tap again.
TOOLTIPS.PAINTBRUSH: Allows for the freehand painting of your selected scene. Just point, click or tap and drag to add color to any area.
TOOLTIPS.REDO: Step forward from your last action.
TOOLTIPS.REMOVEAREA: Use this tool to select and remove paint from a defined area.
TOOLTIPS.SELECTAREA: Select an area, then use the tool bar to paint, edit paint colors or remove paint from your scene.
TOOLTIPS.SELECTGROUP: Use this tool to group and edit multiple areas at the same time. Use the Delete tool to remove areas from your scene.
TOOLTIPS.UNDO: Step backwards from your last action.
TOOLTIPS.ZOOM: Zoom in and pan around within your scene to paint small areas with increased accuracy.

PREVIEW_ROTATE_SCALE: Use these arrows to rotate your image.
RESTORE_COLOR_SWATCH_TO_DEFAULT_SIZE: Restore the Color Swatch to default size

SAVE_LIVE_PALETTE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Please enter a name for the live palette.
SAVE_LIVE_PALETTE_MODAL.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_WARNING: The color palette must have at least one color to be saved.

SAVE_SCENE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Please enter a name for the scene.
SAVE_SCENE_MODAL.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_WARNING: This scene cannot be saved to your account. You can download the image by clicking the icon to the right of your palette.
